{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QAltimeters\nIndicate altitude of aircraft by detecting changes in the static pressure\nThree mechanical types\nSimple Altimeters\nSensitive Altimeters\nServo-Assited Altimeters\\E$"}
{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\QOzone\nOzone 03 is produced by action of solar radiation on high altitude oxygen\nToxic and Damages lungs by destroying elasticity of the tissue (emphysema)\nLittle is present in troposphere, but above it rises rapidly\nThe Greatest concentrations in Winter and Spring\nMost concentrated between 50 000ft and 100 000ft\nGreater risk on transpolar flights due to tropopause being lower\\E$"}
